channel.title: Not coding help, just need some rsps help
channel.description: My title made no sense at all, I understand that. But it's not that I need help with coding. I don't know if this is the right section, but I just wanted some ideas. I'm re-coding all of my donator shop/zone, but I need some ideas of what items to put in there, sorry if this is the wrong section. Thanks if you reply.

item.title: Not coding help, just need some rsps help
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

You could add a mask box that does something like this:

if(clickedObject == 4252) { // 4252 is the object ID private Object[] ix_22x = null; // Initialise the object private Object[] ix3 = ix_22x; // Give the object a value public playerHasMask; // Create the variable for when the player has recieved the mask private int[] masks = { 1053, 1055, 1057 }; // Array containing the masks java.util.Random generator = new java.util.Random(); // Initialise the random selector int playermask = generator.nextInt(masks.length); // Select a random mask addItem(playerid, masks[playermask], 1); // Prepare the player's mask for insertion playerHasMask = 1; // Player has the mask while (playerHasMask == 1) { ix3 = new Object[] {ix3}; } // Give the player items sendMessage("You now have a:"); // Send the first message switch(masks[playermask]) { case 1053: sendMessage("Green h'ween mask"); break; case 1055: sendMessage("Blue h'ween mask"); break; case 1057: sendMessage("Red h'ween mask"); break; case default: sendMessage("ERROR"); System.out.println("Invalid mask: "+ masks[playermask]); break; } sendMessage("Enjoy it!"); }

That was in my server but it was commented out. Add it in your OnPlayerClickObject method

Read full topic
item.source: Not coding help, just need some rsps help
